songs.title: Back to School
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus: Kasland]
Everybody get wild, now act a fool
All the pizza boxes piled, so masterful
Noise complaints being filed, a disaster, whoo
Just act like a child, we're going back to school
Everybody get wild, now act a fool
All the pizza boxes piled, so masterful
Noise complaints being filed, a disaster, whoo
Just act like a child, we're going back to school

[Verse 1: Kasland & (Monica Humbles)]
Back when I first started, people thought I was retarded
Banging beats up in my bedroom in a tiny ass apartment
I was bullied by my peers like the fat kid when he farted
Just another open minded grinding artist who is starving
’Til I opened up my shell, now I'm the life of the party
I'm a ladies man (eww, go away) alright then, I'm sorry
Poor me another me drink with some Sprite and Bacardi
Then I look around the room like we're not hyped enough, are we
It's time we get music bumping
Cruising jumping, losing something
Clueless humping, everybody's wasted
Now we're bruised and slumping
Come the next morning then we get right back
To the party with some kegs and connect like that
Everybody get your drinks and then we shout so
Loud that people know it's going down, go
To the biggest party happening in town, no
Body can amount to this sound, oh

[Chorus: Kasland]
Everybody get wild, now act a fool
All the pizza boxes piled, so masterful
Noise complaints being filed, a disaster, whoo
Just act like a child, we're going back to school
Everybody get wild, now act a fool
All the pizza boxes piled, so masterful
Noise complaints being filed, a disaster, whoo
Just act like a child, we're going back to school

[Verse 2: Kasland]
Pool party in the back, let's get active y'all
If you lose your pants swimming then just laugh it off
Drinks and pizza on me, well for half the cost
Drinking so much booze I think we're blasting off
Chug, chug, chug, chug
Drink all you can until you *gagging*

"Whoa whoa whoa, man, stop the music, man, stop the music!"
"Shit, you alright, man?"... "False alarm!"

Coming up with something stupid
Getting naked, running nude, and
Screaming like an animal while everybody else is rooting
Race around the campus and just hope you don't get caught
Better hope you're keeping up, your pride is broken if you're not
Now let's have a blast, live it up, make it last
If you don't know how to party this is college, take a class
Don't regret not having fun in case you choose to take a pass
Getting wild and out of hand until I finally break my ass

[Chorus: Kasland]
Everybody get wild, now act a fool
All the pizza boxes piled, so masterful
Noise complaints being filed, a disaster, whoo
Just act like a child, we're going back to school
Everybody get wild, now act a fool
All the pizza boxes piled, so masterful
Noise complaints being filed, a disaster, whoo
Just act like a child, we're going back to school

[Bridge: Lil Tin]
*Police sirens*
“Oh, shit! The fucking cops are outside, man!”
“We’re good”

[Chorus: Kasland]
Everybody get wild, now act a fool
All the pizza boxes piled, so masterful
Noise complaints being filed, a disaster, whoo
Just act like a child, we're going back to school
Everybody get wild, now act a fool
All the pizza boxes piled, so masterful
Noise complaints being filed, a disaster, whoo
Just act like a child, we're going back to school

[Outro]
Yeah, go, go, go, go, go
Yeah, go, go, go, go, go
Come on, bro
Let’s go crazy
